page.title: 05My Holiday
page.content: For our holiday my family decided to go to Minorca.My sister,Kate,aged five,Myself aged eight and my mum and dad,we were all going.We were going for a fortnight. We traveled by car to Bristol Airport.Then we traveled by plane to Minorca.We left St Arvans at 4.3o am and arrived in Minorca at 10.30am . We stayed at a place called Tamarinda and the area was called Playa De Cala'n Bosch. We stayed in a villa which meant that we had a self_catering holiday.We mainly went to Minorca for the beach and the good weather. Sarah Nash
